section.heading: Rulemaking authority.
section.text: The Mayor shall promulgate rules in accordance with Chapter 5 of Title 2, to carry out the purposes of this chapter. The rules shall be promulgated within 90 days of May 7, 2002.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 401 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).
